name: Offshore Conditions #01 - T-Shirt (Sand Color)
description:
OffshoreSurfWear offers specialized vintage-like T-Shirts featuring peak performance surfers.  The Image is silk screened on the front left chest of the T-Shirt.

T-Shirts are the super soft Gildan SoftStyle 4.5 oz 100% ringspun preshrunk cotton complete with seamless double-needle stitched collar, tapered neck and shoulders.   Bonus free shipping is included with each order.

10% of all proceeds is donated to SurfAid International.   The mission of SurfAid International.org, a non profit humanitarian organization, is to improve the health, well being and self-reliance of people living in isolated regions connected to us through surfing.

Copyright 2009 Radiant Digital Photography - All rights reserved.
